text: White Sun of the Desert () is a 1970 Russian adventure-comedy movie directed by Vladimir Motyl and starring Galina Dashevskaya, Anatoly Kuznetsov, Pavel Luspekaev, Spartak Mishulin, Kakhi Kavsadze, Nikolai Godovikov. It was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 comedy movies Category:1970 adventure movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian adventure movies Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies set in Turkmenistan Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Motyl
title: White Sun of the Desert
